name: Chapter 7: Advanced Studies
short_description: With her initial success, Sarah dives into more advanced magical studies and starts working on more complex magi tech projects.
from_prev_chapter: Sarah gains admiration for her invention.
to_next_chapter: Sarah faces her first major challenge.

beats.long_title: Sarah Dives Deep into Advanced Magical Theory
beats.description: Sarah attends her first advanced class, where the complexity of the magical theories being taught leaves her both excited and overwhelmed. The teacher introduces her to arcane subjects she has only scratched the surface of before.

beats.long_title: Sarah Interacts with Her New Advanced Classmates
beats.description: Sarah meets her new classmates, an eclectic mix of seasoned magical students who are both curious and skeptical of her unique background.

beats.long_title: Sarah’s First Challenge in Advanced Studies
beats.description: During one of the advanced classes, Sarah is given a challenging assignment that requires her to apply both her engineering skills and magical knowledge.

beats.long_title: Sarah Spends Late Nights in the Workshop
beats.description: To keep up with the demanding coursework, Sarah finds herself spending late nights in the school’s workshop, working tirelessly on her assignments and new invention ideas.

beats.long_title: Sarah Gets a Breakthrough Idea for a New Magi Tech Project
beats.description: Inspired by her advanced studies, Sarah conceptualizes a groundbreaking new magi tech project that could revolutionize everyday life in this magical society.

beats.long_title: Sarah Gathers Resources for Her New Project
beats.description: Sarah seeks out rare materials and magical components needed for her new project, learning to navigate the intricate supply chains of the magical world.
Recognizing the need for expertise beyond her own, Sarah collaborates with her fellow students, pooling their diverse skills and knowledge to bring her new project to life.
After weeks of hard work, Sarah creates the first prototype of her magi tech invention, eager to test its capabilities.

beats.long_title: Sarah Tests and Tweaks Her Prototype
beats.description: Sarah tests her prototype rigorously, facing multiple failures and making necessary adjustments to perfect her invention.

beats.long_title: Sarah Gets a Glimpse of Success
beats.description: After a rigorous testing phase, Sarah’s prototype finally shows promising signs of success, setting the stage for her to face her first major challenge in the next chapter.
